0.title: HTML
0.description: HTML stands for HyperText Markup Language, representing the first letters of the words.

1.title: CSS
1.description: CSS, in addition to HTML, provides additional capabilities in text and formatting.

2.title: Stylus
2.description: Stylus is a small pen-shaped tool used to enter commands on a computer screen, mobile device, or graphic tablet.

3.title: Sass - Scss
3.description: Scss is a CSS preprocessor that provides features not present in regular CSS.

4.title: Javascript
4.description: JavaScript is a programming language that, along with HTML and CSS, is one of the fundamental technologies of the World Wide Web.

5.title: React JS
5.description: Created by Facebook in 2011 to improve the performance of websites, React JS has been widely adopted by developers worldwide.

6.title: Next.JS
6.description: Next.js is a React.js library that allows you to develop web applications with Server-Side Rendering (SSR) using React.js.

7.title: Vue.JS
7.description: Vue (Vue.js / Vue JS) is a popular open-source JavaScript library that allows the creation of user interfaces (UI) and single-page applications.

8.title: Figma
8.description: Figma is a cloud-based design and prototyping tool for digital projects.

0.title: What is JavaScript?
0.description: JavaScript is often confused with Java. While Java is a programming language, JavaScript is a scripting language.

1.title: What is Next.js?
1.description: Next.js is a library for React.js. With this library, you can develop web applications that perform Server-Side Rendering (SSR) using React.js.

2.title: What is React JS?
2.description: ReactJS is a powerful JavaScript library used by developers to create user interfaces for web applications.

3.title: What is JavaScript?
3.description: JavaScript is often confused with Java. While Java is a programming language, JavaScript is a scripting language.

4.title: What is Next.js?
4.description: Next.js is a library for React.js. With this library, you can develop web applications that perform Server-Side Rendering (SSR) using React.js.

5.title: What is React JS?
5.description: ReactJS is a powerful JavaScript library used by developers to create user interfaces for web applications.

0.title: JavaScript Nedir?
0.description: Java ile JavaScript karıştırılmaktadır. Java bir programlama dili JavaScript ise betik dilidir.

1.title: Next.js Nedir?
1.description: Next.js bir React.js kütüphanesidir. Bu kütüphane sayesinde React.js kullanarak SSR (Server Side Rendering) işlemi yapabilen web uygulamaları geliştirebiliyorsunuz

2.title: React JS Nedir?
2.description: ReactJS, geliştiriciler tarafından web uygulamaları için kullanıcı arayüzleri oluşturmak amacıyla kullanılan güçlü bir JavaScript kütüphanesidir.

3.title: JavaScript Nedir?
3.description: Java ile JavaScript karıştırılmaktadır. Java bir programlama dili JavaScript ise betik dilidir.
